title: Luxury Five-Star Madinah District Escape Overlooking the Prophet's Mosque Al-Masjid an-Nabaw
description: Set in Saudi Arabia's central Medina district, the five-star InterContinental Dar al Hijra Madinah, an IHG Hotel, soars majestically above the nearby Prophet's Mosque Al-Masjid an-Nabaw. With three restaurants and bars, the boutique-style hotel sets the standard with a dining experience to suit every taste. Between adventures, enjoy an aromatic coffee or tea in the Tea Lounge or explore close-by Islamic sites such as Ziyarat, Masjid Quba, Masjid Al Qiblatain and The Seven Mosques.
location_description: InterContinental Dar al Hijra Madinah, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: King Fahad Street Central Area, Madinah al Mounawarah, Medina, Saudi Arabia, 41455
